content.body: Chris de Almeida What is https://github.com/tc39/Admin-and-Business/blob/main/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/delegate-to-invited-expert.md for, if not for when a delegate leaves their company and somebody wants to keep them around as an invited expert?
